description: Up to 7,000 homes and businesses are back online after a two-day outage, Manx Telecom says.
title: Thousands have broadband connection restored on Isle of Man
title_page: Thousands have broadband connection restored on Isle of Man - BBC News
maintext: Apologising to those affected, Mr Lamb said the firm would be applying a credit to those who used their mobile phone as an alternative to broadband.
